document_data.name: ''Earthen Mantle''
document_data.mainbody: e cloak was quartered with white and red, with a diamond in the center.
document_data.Description: The cloak was quartered with white and red, with a diamond in the center.
document_data.Powers: The ''earthen mantle'' greatly improved blasts of [[evocation]] and force-based magic, and oddly improved the wearer's balance.
document_data.History: An ''earthen mantle'' could be found in the treasures of Mistress [[Laerion'vyr]]'s [[Drow outpost (Stonelands)|drow outpost]] in the [[Stonelands]].
